fields.title: software engineer
fields.responsibilities:
Design and develop embedded software applications and firmware for various hardware platforms
    Perform testing and debugging to ensure the reliability and performance of embedded systems
    Work with AI in software development life cycle
    Work independently and as part of a team to deliver solutions
    Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in the embedded systems industry
fields.requirement:
Bachelor’s degree or higher diploma in Computer Science, Information Technology, Computer   Engineering or related disciplines
    Experience in embedded application development
    Excel in C/C++, Python programming
    Fast learner, self-motivated, passionate and good team player
    Excellent communication, analytical, and problem-solving skills
    Experience in AI model training & AI assisted development is highly desirable

fields.title: software engineer
fields.responsibilities:
• Design, develop, and debug embedded software applications and firmware for various hardware platforms.

• Apply software design principles, such as modularity, encapsulation, and abstraction, to create scalable and maintainable software solutions.

• Leverage media technology to develop embedded software solutions for multimedia applications, such as audio/video processing and streaming.

• Perform low-level programming, including device drivers, peripheral interfaces, and system initialization.

• Conduct hardware-software integration and testing to ensure seamless functionality and compatibility.
fields.requirement:
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or the related ones.
Bachelor's degree with 3-5 years or Master's degree with 1-3 years of experience in developing embedded software using C/C++.
Understanding of software and hardware interfaces, familiar with at least one RTOS. Experience in device driver development is a plus.

fields.title: Embedded Software Development Lead
fields.responsibilities:
Analyses, designs, tests, codes, secures, debugs, modifies, deploys, integrates and maintains (system) software enhancements, test environment and/or new software to have an impact on the product and solutions direction and customer experience.

•Uses state-of-the-art technologies and practices to drive superior customer value. Interacts with users/ product owners to define/ adjust requirements and/or necessary modifications.

•Keeps abreast of technical developments and practices in own field through literature, courses/trainings, technical contacts, and competitive environment, all to ensure the development of great customer digital solutions.
fields.requirement:
Master or PhD in Software or Electronics engineering

•Solid Experience (>5 years) in working from new ​product development to life cycle sustaining engineering and quality improvement projects.

•Ability to collaborate with a wide range of professionals in matrix organization & lead through influence​, both internally and externally with suppliers/partners.

•Solid experience in Software development (>5 years), from Firmware to Cloud and Mobile App types of use cases for B2C IoT devices such as Connected Baby Video Monitor, Vital Sign Monitors, etc.

•Programming languages & paradigms, methodologies and techniques. Lean / Agile / SAFe.

•Very familiar with product development process waterfall type and V-model as PDLM.

•Fluency in Chinese Mandarin and/or Cantonese written/spoken is a must, next fluency in English written/spoken.

fields.title: EMBEDDED SOFTWARE ENGINEER ( HONG KONG BASE )
fields.responsibilities:
Responsible for handling software development in 4bit/8bit/16bit/32bit

Microcontroller including programming, debugging, performance testing and project follow-up of electrical safety device and consumer products.

Write efficient, scalable, and maintainable code using appropriate programming languages and tools

Optimize embedded software for performance, power consumption, and resource utilization

Participate in code reviews, testing, and debugging to ensure the quality and reliability of the software

Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in the embedded software industry

Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior team members
fields.requirement:
Diploma graduate or above in Electronic or Computer Engineering or related discipline

At least 2 years of experience in MCU embedded software programming

Candidates with less experience or fresh graduates will be considered as Junior Embedded Software Engineer with training provide

Candidates with more experience will be considered as Senior Embedded Software Engineer

Good Command of English & Mandarin

Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment

fields.title: Electronic Hardware Engineer
fields.responsibilities:
•Responsible for testing and evaluating performance of WiFi access points or routers.

•Project support for the new WiFi products during EVT/DVT and PVT.

•Conduct indoor/outdoor field testings to verify performance.

•Carry out data analysis of the measurement results.
fields.requirement:
•High Cert/High Diploma/Bachelor degree in Electronic Engineering or equivalent.

•3 to 5 years experience of electronic products development.

•Fresh graduate is also welcome for those who have passion for hardware development.

•Hands-on experience with prototyping/testing of wireless electronic hardware is preferred.

•Hands-on experience with test equipment such as oscilloscope, DVM and RF communication equipment is preferred.

•       Programming experience for embedded environment such as RPi/Arduino or other SBC is a plus;

•       Knowledge of WiFi is preferred but on-job training will be provided; 

•       Good command of English, Chinese and PTH

fields.title: Electronic Engineer
fields.responsibilities:
• Electronic product circuit design
• Embedded MCU
fields.requirement:
• Proficient in C-programming
• Graduate in Computer Engineering / Electronic Engineering
• Assembly programming and debugging experience
• One year of work experience in the development of one or more of the following :

Thermostats

LVGL or relevant GUI scripting experience

Flutter or relevant App design experience

Wi-Fi / BLE / LoRaWAN / Zigbee

AWS / Thingsboard

embedded Linux product development

fields.title: Programmer / Senior Programmer
fields.responsibilities:
End-to-end system development from requirement collections, feasibility study, system design, implementation, to system deployment
    Perform quality assurance on project deliverable
    Support and facilitate Project Manager in planning, executing, monitoring and reporting to ensure project success
fields.requirement:
HD or above in Computer Science or IT related disciplines
    For Analyst Programmer min 2 years of IT experience 
    For Senior Analyst Programmer min 4 years of IT experience 
    Hands on Experience in the following:  
    JAVA, Spring, Spring boot or,
    .NET 
    JavaScript / PHP 
    React.js, Node.js
    C/C++
    React native / Flutter
    Swift / Kotlin / Java(Mobile)

fields.title: Analyst Programmer / Senior Programmer
fields.responsibilities:
Provide business-process automation and IT solutions to overseas branches
    Focus on system development/maintenance/technical support
    Participate in the technical solutions, programs coding and implementations
    Involve in new core banking system implementations
    Provide applications training to end users
fields.requirement:
Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or related disciplines 
    Skillful technique on developing IT solutions to meet our business needs and enhancing our systems
    A positive, 'can-do' working attitude, and an active self-starter character that will continuously add values to own responsibilities
    Good understanding of system documentation and familiar with SDLC
    2 to 3 years development experience on C# / VB.net, ASP.net, Java, JavaScript, MS SQL, Oracle and any web based applications
    Good hands-on knowledge on Windows, Unix, or Linux platform is a definite advantage
    General banking, Treasury and Trade Finance systems knowledge is a plus but no compulsory
    Proficient in English & Chinese

fields.title: Computer Vision Engineer
fields.responsibilities:
Develop Computer Vision products and solutions to enable semiconductor world
    On-job training will be provided to master computer vision technology
    Work as a team and cooperate with different R&D teams
    Implement computer vision software and design inspection algorithm
    Opportunity to design computer vision and imaging system
    Algorithm prove-of-concept and capability enhancement
fields.requirement:
Bachelor Degree or above in Computer Engineering / Computer Science / Electronic Engineering / Information Engineering or relevant disciplines
    Experience in C/C++ programming
    Passion in research and development
    Interested in problem solving

 

Attractive salary and fringe benefits package will be offered to the right candidates.

Please visit our company website for our company background, products and other useful information.
Website: https://www.asmpt.com/

fields.title: Control Engineer / Senior Control Engineer
fields.responsibilities:
Focus on electro-mechanical system motion and process control
    Develop advanced motion control algorithm to achieve submicron precision motion
    Develop the machine diagnostic and prognostic mechanisms for mechatronic system
    Improve the process performance of semiconductor packaging machinery
fields.requirement:
Bachelor/ Master/ PhD Degree with specialization in Electrical, Mechanical, Automation, Mechatronics, or relevant disciplines
    Control engineering fundamentals in classical and modern control methodologies
    Enjoy tackling technical challenges of providing creative solutions to complex engineering system
    Candidate possesses one or more of the following competencies is preferred:
        Hands-on experience in time domain and frequency domain instrumentation, e.g. scope, dynamic signal analyzers, modal analysis, laser sensors, accelerometer, etc.; or
        Familiar with system analysis and system modeling, particularly mechanical servo, system dynamics, vibration, thermal process, motor, sensors and drive system; or
        Experience in robust control and adaptive control; or
        Proficient in MATLAB, C/C++ and real-time computer system; or
        Experience in machine learning and data analysis.
    A good hands-on problem solver, with analytical mind and attention to details
    Good command of English is a must
    Good command of Mandarin is preferred

 

Attractive salary and fringe benefits package will be offered to the right candidates.

Please visit our company website for our company background, products and other useful information.
Website: https://www.asmpt.com/

fields.title: Electrical Engineer (Fresh Graduate / IANG Holder Is Welcome)
fields.responsibilities: Design and development of electrical power system for electrical machines
fields.requirement:
Bachelor's Degree in Electrical Engineering or relevant disciplines
    Electrical power system design for industrial machines
    Power estimation of the machines
    Machine power system design for safety
    With rich experiences and in-depth knowledge in the area of electrical system design will be considered for senior post

 

Attractive salary and fringe benefits package will be offered to the right candidates.

Please visit our company website for our company background, products and other useful information.
Website: https://www.asmpt.com/

fields.title: Full Stack Web Developer
fields.responsibilities:
Participate in innovative Cloud-based Applications Development for Hotels, Theme Parks, and Restaurants
    Develop Cloud API for partners and customers to build their own app to integrate to our cloud infrastructure
    Develop E-Commerce Mobile Applications for our Cloud-based Applications
    Performance testing and optimization in APIs
    Work as a team to contribute on tertiary level application support for global implementations
    Work on Agile Scrum Development methodology
fields.requirement:
Bachelor Degree holder in Computer Science or related disciplines
    Experience in PHP Framework e.g. CakePHP, Laravel, CodeIgniter, Symfony or Yii is a plus
    Experience in React, Vue.js, Angular or jQuery is a plus
    Experience in MySQL, SQLServer or any RDBMS is a plus
    Experience in RESTful API and/or web services development is a plus
    Experience in Mobile App development (Swift, Flutter) is a plus
    Knowledge in Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud Platform, or other IaaS cloud service providers is a plus
    Self-motivated, good team player and strong sense of responsibility
    Good command of both spoken and written English and Chinese. Mandarin is an advantage
    More experienced candidate can be considered as Senior Full Stack Web Developer

fields.title: Assistant IT Engineer
fields.location: Tai Kok Tsui, Yau Tsim Mong District
fields.responsibilities:
Conduct requirement study, analysis & design, prepare documentation and co-ordinate with users, technical and operations teams
Lead the analyst programmers/programmers by providing guidelines and assistance to enable solution development and implementation, with passion to be hands-on with coding
Develop and maintain application programs
Prepare test plan, test cases/scripts, test environments, data and perform testing
Support user acceptance testing and system implementation
Prepare system and operations documents
Provide ongoing user and application support
fields.requirement:
Degree holder in Computer Science, Information Technology or related disciplines
A minimum of 1-2 years’ experience in IT profession
Knowledgeable and experienced in design, programming and microservices
Proficiency in Java, J2EE, AngularJS , JavaScript, XML, JSON, Oracle/MySQL, Unix
Knowledgeable in ReactJS is advantageous
Effective verbal and written communication in English and Chinese
With passion in technology forefront, such as microservices, DevOps, RPA and Customer Experience
Good analytical, inter-personal and problem solving skills
Good team player, positive attitude, innovative, self-initiating, eager to learn and share with other team members, hardworking, able to work under pressure and work independently
Candidates with less qualification and experience will be considered as Analyst Programmer or Programmer
Experience in BRM 7.3 and 12 is advantageous
